findBySubname

protected java.util.List<T> findBySubname(java.lang.String[] subnames,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> substringMatchProperties,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> exactMatchProperties)
A variation of findBySubname(java.lang.String[], java.util.List, java.util.List) that does not allow for extra conditions

findBySubname

protected java.util.List<T> findBySubname(java.lang.String[] subnames,
                                          java.lang.String extraConditions,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.Object> extraParameters,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> substringMatchProperties,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> exactMatchProperties)
A query builder for use by subclass DAOs. It makes it easy to match a fragment of a name or identifier against multiple properties. This is intended for use in implementing user-friendly dynamic searches; e.g., autocompleters.

Parameters:
subnames - the name fragments to search on
extraConditions - custom HQL conditions with which to constrain the fragment matches
extraParameters - parameters for the custom conditions
substringMatchProperties - a list of properties of the implementing object which should be matched as case-insensitive substrings
exactMatchProperties - a list of properties which should be matched as case-insensitive full strings
Returns:
a list of matching domain object instances

buildSubnameQuery

protected java.lang.String buildSubnameQuery(java.lang.String[] subnames,
                                             java.lang.String extraConditions,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Object> extraParameters,
                                             java.lang.String joins,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> substringMatchProperties,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> exactMatchProperties)
Will build the sub name query.

Parameters:
subnames - the name fragments to search on
extraConditions - custom HQL conditions with which to constrain the fragment matches
extraParameters - parameters for the custom conditions
joins - the join conditions to use
params - the constraints parameters.
substringMatchProperties - a list of properties of the implementing object which should be matched as case-insensitive substrings
exactMatchProperties - a list of properties which should be matched as case-insensitive full strings
Returns:
a String representation of the Query

searchByExample

public java.util.List<T> searchByExample(T sample,
                                         boolean inexactMatches)
Searches based on an example object. For example, if you want to search for a Participant based on last name:
  • Participant sample = new Participant();
  • sample.setLastName("last_namee");
  • participantDao.searchByExample(study)

Returns:
list of matching instances based on your sample object
